dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The annual production of pigs in the farm is 100,000. It takes approximately six months to raise a pig from farrow to finish at a mean final weight of 100 kg. All pigs are raised in indoor barns and the pig farming includes the rearing of breeding and commercial pigs. The manure of pigs is pushed into a covered anaerobic lagoon for storage. In this study, the pig production process is divided into seven steps to find out the key points affecting the sustainability of the process based on the “life cycle thinking” (Fig. 1). It should be noted that the data of sows and boars on inputs and outputs are average to each commercial pig (Appendix A).
农场年产10万头猪。从一头猪出生到平均最终体重为100公斤，大约需要6个月的时间。所有猪均在室内猪舍内饲养，养猪业包括种猪和商品猪的饲养。猪的粪便被推入一个有盖的厌氧泻湖储存。本研究基于“生命周期思维”，将生猪生产过程分为七个步骤，找出影响过程可持续性的关键点(图1)。需要注意的是，母猪和公猪的投入和产出数据对每头商品猪是平均的(附录A)。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit for the case is 1000 pigs so as to be affiliated with the EME results.

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: All of the raw data are obtained by formal survey questionnaires from the farm manager and worker, on-site observations and measurements from the authors in 2012.
所有原始数据均通过农场经理和工人的正式调查问卷、现场观察和作者在2012年的测量获得。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: This study takes an intensive pig farming system as the representative which locates on a large-scale farm (Jinlong Company) in Jing County , Hebei Province, China.
本研究以河北省靖县某大型养猪场(金龙公司)集约化生猪养殖系统为代表。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: This study takes an intensive pig farming system as the representative which locates on a large-scale farm (Jinlong Company) in Jing County (37580N, 115990E), Hebei Province, China. The annual production of pigs in the farm is 100,000. It takes approximately six months to raise a pig from farrow to finish at a mean final weight of 100 kg. All pigs are raised in indoor barns and the pig farming includes the rearing of breeding and commercial pigs. The manure of pigs is pushed into a covered anaerobic lagoon for storage. In this study, the pig production process is divided into seven steps to find out the key points affecting the sustainability of the process based on the “life cycle thinking” (Fig. 1). It should be noted that the data of sows and boars on inputs and outputs are average to each commercial pig (Appendix A). All of the raw data are obtained by formal survey questionnaires from the farm manager and worker, on-site observations and measurements from the authors in 2012.

本研究以位于中国河北省靖县(37580N, 115990E)的大型养猪场(金龙公司)的集约化生猪养殖系统为代表。这个农场年产10万头猪。从一头猪出生到平均最终体重为100公斤，大约需要6个月的时间。所有猪均在室内猪舍内饲养，养猪业包括种猪和商品猪的饲养。猪的粪便被推入一个有盖的厌氧泻湖储存。在这项研究中,猪生产过程分为七个步骤找出关键影响的可持续性过程基于“生命周期思想”(图1)。需要注意的是,母猪和公猪的数据输入和输出是平均每个商业猪(附录A)。所有的原始数据都是通过正式的调查问卷从农场经理和工人,2012年从作者现场观察和测量。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This intensive pig farming system is primarily used for the large-scale production of pigs, both for breeding purposes and for commercial meat production. The process includes the rearing of pigs from birth to a final weight of approximately 100 kg over a span of six months. The operations are conducted indoors, which encompasses the management of breeding sows and boars, as well as commercial pigs. A notable feature is the handling of pig manure, which is stored in a covered anaerobic lagoon, indicating a potential integration of waste management within the pig farming process.
这种集约化养猪系统主要用于大规模生产猪只，包括为繁殖目的和商业肉类生产而养殖的猪。该过程包括从出生到最终体重大约100公斤的六个月大猪的饲养。所有操作均在室内进行，包括种猪和商品猪的管理。值得注意的是，处理猪粪涵盖在养猪过程中，采用覆盖式厌氧泻湖进行粪便储存，表明养猪过程可能整合了废物管理。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Life cycle impact assessment (LCIA) is the phase in which the results of the inventory analysis are further processed and interpreted in terms of environmental impacts and societal preferences (Khoshnevisan et al., 2014). In this study, the CML2001 (Guin et al., 2001) is selected and seven environmental impact categories related to pig farming closely are involved as follows: water depletion (WD), land use (LU), global warming potential (GWP), eutrophication potential (EP), acidification potential (AP), soil toxicity (ST) and malodors air (MA). Moreover, normalization step is necessary for comparison of the environmental profiles. The normalization factors of world per-capita environmental impact for the year 2000 (Sleeswijk et al., 2008) are involved to calculate the normalization results in this study.

生命周期影响评估(LCIA)是进一步处理清单分析结果并根据环境影响和社会偏好进行解释的阶段(Khoshnevisan etal .， 2014)。本研究选择CML2001 (Guin ee, 2001)，涉及与养猪业密切相关的7个环境影响类别，分别是:水资源枯竭(WD)、土地利用(LU)、全球变暖潜势(GWP)、富营养潜势(EP)、酸化潜势(AP)、土壤毒性(ST)和霉变空气(MA)。此外，标准化步骤是必要的，以比较环境概况。本研究采用2000年世界人均环境影响归一化因子(Sleeswijk et al.， 2008)计算归一化结果。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: All of the raw data are obtained by formal survey questionnaires from the farm manager and worker, on-site observations and measurements from the authors in 2012. The data of emissions deriving from combustion of coal are from study (Liang, 2009). Those on the production of manure and the emissions of total nitrogen (TN), total phosphorus (TP), Cu and Zn from manure are from CAAS (Chinese academy of agricultural sciences) and MEP (Ministry of Environmental Protection) of China. The data on other metal pollutants such as Cd, Pb, As, Cr and Ni are obtained from Liu et al. (2005). The Data concerning air emissions (i.e., emission factors and coefficients) in the gastrointestinal fermentation of pig and manure management are obtained from IPCC (2006). Ammonia emissions due to the pig manure are estimated according to Liu et al. (2007). Data on the odor emissions from manure are obtained based on Zeng et al. (2003).

所有原始数据均通过农场经理和工人的正式调查问卷、现场观察和作者在2012年的测量获得。煤燃烧产生的排放数据来源于研究(Liang, 2009)。关于粪便的产生和粪便中总氮(TN)、总磷(TP)、铜和锌的排放数据来自中国农业科学院和环境保护部。Cd、Pb、as、Cr、Ni等其他金属污染物数据来源于Liu etal .(2005)。关于猪胃肠发酵和粪便管理过程中空气排放(即排放因子和系数)的数据来自IPCC(2006)。根据Liu et al.(2007)估算猪粪产生的氨排放量。粪便异味排放数据来源于Zeng et al.(2003)。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Wang, X. et al. Sustainability evaluation of the large-scale pig farming system in North China: an emergy analysis based on life cycle assessment. Journal of Cleaner Production 102, 144–164 (2015).
Wang, X. et al. Sustainability evaluation of the large-scale pig farming system in North China: an emergy analysis based on life cycle assessment. Journal of Cleaner Production 102, 144–164 (2015).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA dataset, data users must consider 'life cycle thinking' and focus on the sustainability of the pig production process. For accurate environmental impact assessments, it is important to account for all inputs and outputs associated with each production step, treating the system as a 'black box'. Data on sows and boars should be adjusted to represent average inputs and outputs per commercial pig, as specified in Appendix A. Moreover, users should also include emissions from coal combustion and manure management, which may involve pollutants such as nitrogen, phosphorus, metals, and also consider the impact of odors. For impact analysis, users should apply the CML2001 methodology and use normalization factors for appropriate environmental impact comparisons. Lastly, it is critical to note that data is farm-specific and may not be representative for all farming operations, additionally, the data was collected in 2012 and may not reflect current conditions.

在使用这个生命周期评估(LCA)数据集时，数据使用者必须考虑到“生命周期思维”，专注于猪生产过程的可持续性。为了准确的环境影响评估，重要的是要计算与每个生产步骤相关的所有输入和输出，将系统作为一个“黑箱”处理。关于种猪的数据应按照附录A的规定调整，以代表每头商品猪的平均输入和输出。此外，用户还应包括来自煤炭燃烧和粪便管理的排放，这可能涉及氮、磷、金属等污染物，还应考虑异味的影响。对于影响分析，用户应当应用CML2001方法，并使用规范化因子以进行适当的环境影响比较。最后，很关键的一点是，数据是特定于农场的，并可能不代表所有农场操作，另外，数据收集于2012年，可能不反映当前状况。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The original text is steel, which cannot be matched.
